name: XPathResult.invalidIteratorState
description: The read-only invalidIteratorState property of the XPathResult interface signifies that the iterator has become invalid. It is true if XPathResult.resultType is UNORDERED_NODE_ITERATOR_TYPE or ORDERED_NODE_ITERATOR_TYPE and the document has been modified since this result was returned.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 XPath Specification
